document_data.name: Nemevon
document_data.mainbody: '''Nemevon''' was a fallen [[angel]] in the [[Labyrinth]] in the [[Northdark]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The gods condemned Nemevon and seven other fallen angels to remain as stone statues in the depths of the Labyrinth for unknown crimes.
document_data.Personality: Nemevon tried to convince other beings to kill it for its sins.
